Compare Ronaldo and Messi.notes:
Title: Comparative Analysis of Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo's Football Achievements

1. Both Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo are regarded as two of the greatest footballers of all time.
2. Key records held by Lionel Messi include:
   - Five Ballon d'Or/FIFA Ballon d'Or awards
   - Holds the record for most goals in a calendar year (91)
   - Most goals in the UEFA Champions League (140, as of 2025)
   - Holds the record for most goals in the UEFA European Championship and its qualification stage combined (54)
   - Holds the record for most goals scored in a single UEFA Champions League season (17 in 2013-14)
   - Holds the record for most international goals (143)
   - Has made over 226 appearances for his national team
   - Scored all four goals against Sweden in a playoff to qualify for an unspecified tournament
   - Has scored a total of 965 senior career goals for club and country
   - Scores have been distributed as follows: 162 goals at Real Madrid, 116 goals at Al-Nassr, 101 goals at Juventus, and 91 goals for Portugal (Source: https://x.com/alimo_philip/status/2025365528705962173)
   - Missed the 35th penalty of his career (No date specified)

3. Key records held by Cristiano Ronaldo include:
   - Holds the record for most goals in La Liga (474)
   - Has scored 672 goals for Barcelona, which is the most for a single club
   - Has three seasons with 40+ goals in La Liga

4. Both players have won a total of 80 official trophies during their senior careers: Messi with 46 and Ronaldo with 34.
5. Messi has won the European Golden Shoe Award four times, in 2009-10, 2011-12, 2012-13, and an unspecified year.
6. As of Aug 25, 2025, there is a statistical comparison between Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi available online.
7. Between them, Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo have won 13 Ballon d’Ors from 2004 to 2022.
